title: Incredible Energy
provenance_text:
Asger Jorn [1914-1973], Paris, France and Albisola Mare, Savona, Italy; Prospero Guarini, Milan, Italy [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" (no. 230, illustrated in catalogue, plate 53) held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by Prospero Guarini, Milan, Italy.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. Payment (check dated December 30, 1958) was sent to Prospero Guarini in Milan on January 12, 1959.
